item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 1, 2025 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. The most unhinged video wall, made out of Chromebooks (69 points | 7 comments)
2. CoPilot for Everything: Training Your AI Replacement One Keystroke at a Time (35 points | 17 comments)
3. OpenGL to WASM, learning from my mistakes (50 points | 15 comments)
4. Making o1, o3, and Sonnet 3.7 Hallucinate for Everyone (4 points | 1 comment)
5. How to gain code execution on hundreds of millions of people and popular apps (980 points | 230 comments)
6. Maestro – Next Generation Mobile UI Automation (55 points | 20 comments)
7. Depending in Common Lisp – Using the CLOS dependent maintenance protocol (2022) (67 points | 5 comments)
8. GSA Eliminates 18F (128 points | 88 comments)
9. Servo – Open Collective (87 points | 17 comments)
10. The AI Code Review Disconnect: Why Your Tools Aren't Solving Your Real Problem (17 points | 6 comments)
11. Zen 5's AVX-512 Frequency Behavior (156 points | 47 comments)
12. 3,200% CPU Utilization (430 points | 200 comments)
13. The Housing Theory of Everything (2021) (207 points | 197 comments)
14. Certificate Transparency in Firefox (119 points | 85 comments)
15. Why it's so hard to build a jet engine (297 points | 114 comments)
16. Curious Correspondence with Edward Gorey (15 points | 3 comments)
17. OlmOCR: Open-source tool to extract plain text from PDFs (274 points | 34 comments)
18. Vinyl carver sparking a craze for cutting records at home (112 points | 101 comments)
19. Inheriting is becoming nearly as important as working (465 points | 618 comments)
20. Troubleshooting: A skill that never goes obsolete (322 points | 106 comments)
21. What do people see when they're tripping? Analyzing Erowid's trip reports (94 points | 134 comments)
22. Type++: Prohibiting Type Confusion with Inline Type Information [pdf] (17 points | discuss)
23. The Rake and its Prongs (2024) (4 points | discuss)
24. Affixes: The Building Blocks of English (99 points | 13 comments)
25. A Brief and History of Our Search for Life in the Clouds (6 points | discuss)
26. Resident physicians' exam scores tied to patient survival (95 points | 93 comments)
27. Harnessing orbital Hall effect in spin-orbit torque MRAM (42 points | 1 comment)
28. AI is killing some companies, yet others are thriving – let's look at the data (234 points | 265 comments)
29. Write to Escape Your Default Setting (360 points | 84 comments)
30. The serotonin theory of depression: a systematic review of the evidence (2022) (133 points | 102 comments)
